com.visualon.OSMPBasePlayer
Interface voOSBasePlayer.onEventListener

Enclosing class:
voOSBasePlayer
public static interface voOSBasePlayer.onEventListener

Interface for event process. The client who wants to receive event from voOSBasePlayer shall implement the interface.

Method Summary
 int onEvent(int id, int param1, int param2, java.lang.Object obj)
          Interface for event process.
 

Method Detail

onEvent

int onEvent(int id,
            int param1,
            int param2,
            java.lang.Object obj)
Interface for event process. The client who wants to use voOSBasePlayer shall implement the interface.

Parameters:
id - type of the event
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_SRC_CB_Connecting

  • voOSType.VOOSMP_SRC_CB_Download_Fail_Recover_Success

param1 - first param code, specific to the event if needs. Typically implementation dependent.
param2 - second param code, specific to the event if needs. Typically implementation dependent.
obj - third param code, specific to the event if needs. Typically implementation dependent.
Returns:
voOSType.VOOSMP_ERR_None if no error.
